docs.snippet: Tariffs would help steel and aluminum makers that President Trump championed. But manufacturers using their products may be in for harder times.

headline.print_headline: Plan for Tariffs Creates Divide In Trump Base
headline.main: Trump’s Tariff Plan Leaves Blue-Collar Winners and Losers

docs.snippet: The Pentagon said Thursday that Defense Secretary Jim Mattis has talked with President Donald Trump about the possibility that the Pentagon could fund the long-promised border wall with Mexico.

headline.print_headline: Trump, Mattis Discuss Border Wall Funding
headline.main: Trump, Mattis Discuss Border Wall Funding

docs.snippet: The president will need to do a lot of careful planning in the coming weeks for his historic meeting with Kim Jong-un to be a success.

headline.main: Donald Trump and North Korea: What a Fine Mess

docs.snippet: The CNBC commentator, who would replace the former Wall Street executive Gary D. Cohn, said Mr. Trump “regards himself as a free trader.”

headline.print_headline: President Picks TV Commentator as His Economic Adviser
headline.main: Trump Picks CNBC’s Larry Kudlow as Top Economic Adviser

docs.snippet: Before the dust has settled on a plan to introduce sweeping tariffs on foreign metals, the White House is readying another major trade action.

headline.print_headline: Trade Limits And Tariffs  Are Heading China’s Way
headline.main: Trump Readies Sweeping Tariffs and Investment Restrictions on China

docs.snippet: The man who would become secretary of state opposes the nuclear deal with Iran and doubts North Korea will give up its nuclear arsenal through negotiations.

headline.print_headline: Pompeo and Trump  Share a Worldview,  And Some Are Worried
headline.main: Under Pompeo, a Foreign Policy That Fits the President’s Worldview

docs.snippet: Roseanne Barr is reveling in Donald Trump's support for her returning sitcom's impressive debut, which the president says was a cultural and political breakthrough.

headline.print_headline: Barr, President Trump Revel Together in 'Roseanne' Success
headline.main: Barr, President Trump Revel Together in 'Roseanne' Success

docs.snippet: Omarosa Manigault Newman once predicted that "every critic, every detractor will have to bow down to President Trump." The question now for the former White House aide and "Apprentice" contestant is whether that applies to her, too.

headline.print_headline: Omarosa Dishes on Trump and Gets His Attention
headline.main: Omarosa Dishes on Trump and Gets His Attention

docs.snippet: There is little in John R. Bolton’s past to indicate he has much time for the diplomatic process, where to get something the United States also gives something.

headline.print_headline: Volatile Problems Ahead for a Team of Hard-Line Advisers
headline.main: With Bolton, Trump Creates a Hard-Line Foreign Policy Team

docs.snippet: One of President Donald Trump's attorneys floated the possibility of pardoning two of the president's former advisers caught up in the Russia probe in discussions with their lawyers last year, The New York Times reported Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Report: Trump Attorney Discussed Flynn, Manafort Pardons
headline.main: Report: Trump Attorney Discussed Flynn, Manafort Pardons
